import "./service.css" import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Service = () => { const [inputValue, setInputValue] = useState({ title: "", genre: "", auther: "", }); const { title , genre , auther } = inputValue; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Here, you can add your logic to handle book submission. // For demonstration purposes, let's just display the entered data. alert(`New Book Added:\nTitle: ${title}\nAuthor: ${author}\nGenre: ${genre}`); }; return ( <>
